div.head: 水液澄徹清冷
div.div: watery fluids being extremely clear and cold

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

form.pron: Shui ye cheng che qing leng

entry.def: watery fluids being extremely clear and cold

sense.def: Illness Sign of diarrhea that is as liquid and clear as water. Su wen 素問 74: 諸病水液澄徹清冷， 皆屬於寒 , “Without exception, all diseases of watery fluids being extremely clear and cold are associated with cold”.
